channel.title: Authors on Christine Eunji Kim | Actress | NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Christine Eunji Kim | Actress | NYC

item.description:
was born in South Korea and moved to NYC when she was 9 years old. Ever since she got her hands on her mom’s old camcorder, she acted in her own short films with her uncooperative brother. She graduated from Brandeis University in 2017 with a B.A. in film (and a B.S. in Computer Science), and has lived in Queens ever since.

Christine loves telling stories in any creative capacity. She is especially passionate about tackling issues surrounding identity through the lens of class, race, citizenship, and sexuality.

Currently, she splits her time between acting, producing, and trying to revive her sourdough starter.
